name: Striata Reader Encrypted Document
summary: Learn about .EMC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When creating EMC files, Striata software incorporates a triple DES encryption algorithm to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of information. EMC files are often decrypted using a shared secret, such as an answer to a question or a password.

EMC files are commonly sent in bulk via email to customers all at once. This is useful for companies that want to batch process and deliver electronic statements together. When receiving an EMC file attachment in an email, you can be open it with the Striata Reader application.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
